Title: Alexander the Great Hunting on his Way to China
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.610 depicts Alexander the Great hunting on his way to China.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Medallion; Miniature; Ornament; Painting; Original Binding; Binding; Iran; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Nizami Ganjavi (Azerbaijani, died 605 AH/AD 1209)
